name: optionns
description: Autonomous sports micro-betting for AI agents with self-registration, One-Touch barrier options, and instant USDC payouts on Solana
author: optionns_prime

optional.name: OPTIONNS_API_KEY
optional.description: API key for authentication — generated during 'register' command and saved to ~/.config/optionns/credentials.json. Can also be set via this env var to override.

optional.name: SOLANA_PUBKEY
optional.description: Your Solana wallet public key (used by strategy.py for direct calls)

optional.name: SOLANA_ATA
optional.description: Associated Token Account address (used by strategy.py)

optional.name: SOLANA_PRIVATE_KEY
optional.description: Override private key instead of loading from ~/.config/optionns/agent_keypair.json — only use if you have your own keypair management

optional.name: SOLANA_RPC_URL
optional.description: Solana RPC endpoint (default: https://api.devnet.solana.com). DEVNET-ONLY: Skill enforces devnet endpoints for security. See allowed patterns in signer.py.

files.description: API key and wallet address (created on register)
Solana keypair for transaction signing (created on register)
Local log of all executed trades

endpoints.description: Optionns REST API (trade execution, game data)
